name: Shivam Enterprises
overview:
Shivam Enterprises began its journey in Mohali (Punjab), on 20 March, 2008. We are manufacturer and supplier of a broad range of Coated Abrasive Products that encompasses Coated Abrasive Flap Wheels, Abrasive Belts, Spindle Mop Wheels, Abrasive Rolls, Portable Sander Belts, Radial Flap Disc (Cup Wheel), Velcro & PSA Discs, Cloth Discs, Abrasive Sheets, Mounted Points (Grinding Wheel), Fibre Discs, Non Woven Wheels, Non Woven Wheel With Spindles and Felt Discs. These products are sold under the Brand Name “SHARPGRIT”.

Our Infrastructure: We have a single factory, where manufacturing of Coated Abrasives Products is carried out through Electrostatic Grain Coating Machine. The electrostatic grain coating ensures uniform and extremely sharp grain distribution, which results in outstanding performance, long life and excellent surface finish of our product.

Quality: Delivering high quality Coated Abrasive Products helps us to win the loyalty of the clients. Our testing personnel and advanced testing equipment guarantees production of Coated Abrasive Products with excellent features. Furthermore, our range of Coated Abrasive Products is tested against several quality parameters.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric company, we strive to render complete satisfaction to our esteemed clients in every aspect. In order to meet the specific requirements and demands of our clients, we provide our product range in customized form. Each and every product is quality tested on well defined parameters before leaving the company premises to ensure maximum benefits of the clients.

Why Us?: We adopt advanced manufacturing process We use automatic electro coated machinery We offer excellent Coated Abrasive Products We ensure timely delivery of the products to the clients We adhere to ethical business practices
